nodes.text: Lloyd Floyd is a voice actor who interpreted Luke Skywalker in the video game Star Wars: Empire at War and the sequel Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption. He reprised the role of Luke Skywalker for the non-canon expansion of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed: Ultimate Sith Edition, as well as in Star Wars Battlefront: Elite Squadron.
